thread.title: My Stay during Unesco Mobile learning week
thread.title_full: My Stay during Unesco Mobile learning week - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Eiffel Cambronne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MaaritSnellman
title: My Stay during Unesco Mobile learning week
text: I choose this hotel cause I of lovely looking photos and the close location to Unesco. Cosy and peaceful hotel. Just what I need after long hours. Rooms are fresh and I just love to have watercooker on my room to make bedtime time. Management and service generally is very kind, professional and welcoming. Next time in Paris. Definately this hotel.
